about_the_game:
Weird and Creepy Monsters Pack is an RPG Maker official collection of battlers, which are particular for their weird and unsettling look.
With this pack, you can bring to life a world full of strange monsters, helping yourself in the creation of a twisted and creepy world.

■ Includes 20 original battlers with an unique aesthetic.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------


【Monsters (20 images)】

▪ Abyssal croc
▪ Alien spider
▪ Alien tortoise
▪ Angler fish
▪ Armored lizard
▪ Blob
▪ Cave parasite
▪ Face
▪ Hell giant
▪ Jaw
▪ Maneater
▪ Mouthman
▪ Mushroom
▪ Observer
▪ Rock worm
▪ Snake warrior
▪ Space squid
▪ Stone lizard
▪ White demon
▪ Wyvern

-----------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
